item.description:
Folks, its that time of the year when we all put away our bikes in the storage until the roads become driveable again in Spring. If you like snow, snow sports, sound of the exhaust and those speedy demons running wild on the snow, then this meetup is for you...!

http://www.lilmansnowmobilerentals.com/

We'll meet at iRobot and drive up to Bartlett, NH in White Mountains. I have rented snowmobiles with this company before and they are pretty decent. Here are their rental rates. Feel free to make reservations online. They also offer some discounts for early birds and Loon Mt, Waterville Valley, Cannon Mt., or Tenny, Mt. ski pass holders.

We can snowmobile in the trails over there for 2-3hrs or maybe more until we all get bored, then head to Moat Mountain Smokehouse & Brewing company for some great food and drinks.

Please indicate in your RSVP if you would like to drive your car (and offer others ride) or if you need a ride. As usual, we'll share the gas, toll expenses.

Families and +1s are welcome!
item.name: Snowmobiling in White Mountains
